title: Arista Networks Vs Siemens EDA
content:
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: Sotware Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 24,00,000
Retirals: 1,50,000 Retirals (PF + Gratuity)
Relocation / Signing Bonus: 3 Lac
Stock bonus: $25K restricted stock units' grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus (~2 lac)

vs 

Company: Siemens EDA
Title/Level: Sotware Engineer
Location: Noida , India
Salary: INR 26,00,000
Retirals: 1,50,000 Retirals (PF + Gratuity)
Relocation / Signing Bonus: 5 Lac for 2 Year Clause
Bonus: Performance-based bonus (~2 lac)

Which one is better for growth , Quality of work  and future apportunity.

title: Globallogic-Hitachi | New Grad | India
content:

Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0

Benefits: Basic Health Insurace

title: Allen Digital | SDE-1 | Bangalore
content:
* Education: B. Tech in Information Technology from Tier 2.5 University
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: Interned at a small startup for 2 months
* Date of the Offer: Aug 2023
* Company: Allen Digital
* Title/Level: Software Dev. I
* Location: Bangalore
* Base Salary: 18 LPA
* Relocation: 15 days accommodation at a 3-star hotel + tickets to Bangalore
* Joining Bonus: 1 LPA
* Variable Bonus: 1.8LPA 
* Total comp:  20.8LPA(First year 19.8 fixed) 
* Benefits: We can take leave and work from home anytime, no strict policy for checking
* Other details: Did not negotiate at all

title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.tech from one of the new IIITs
Years of Experience:3
Current Company :SSE at MNC(Not public)
Current TC : 34(Base) + 10%Bonus + 6(One Time bonus)

Date of the Offer:1st Aug 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4 / SWEIII
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 37.6L + 2.5(Employer's PF + Gratuity)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1L Sign on Bonus, RB not discussed yet but likely(3-5L)
Stock bonus:$100k - 38% 32% 20% 1%
Bonus: 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1st and 2nd Year ~78L , will reduce a lot starting 3rd year, they said they will give refresher but have heard it has been reduced)
Benefits: Usual Google benefits
Other details: Have no counter offers and this is way much than my current TC, so accepted the offer, also they said they won't increase TC but can reduce and increase components based on my preference but i don't want to wait anymore( already 4 months since first call with HR)

Will add interview exp in details soon, lot of things to recollect
salaryTotal: : 1st And 2nd Year ~78l , Will Reduce A Lot Starting 3rd Year, They Said They Will Give Refresher But Have Heard It Has Been Reduced)

title: Google L3 Hyderabad
content:
**Education**: B.Tech from tier-3 college
**Years of Experience**: 3
**Prior Experience**: Product Based Companies
**Date of the Offer**: August 2024
**Company**: Google
**Title/Level**: SWE 2/ L3
**Location**: Bengaluru
**Salary**: 21.9L + 1.5L retirals
**Relocation**: Not yet discussed with relocation team (expecting 3-5L) 
**Signing Bonus**: 2L
**Stock bonus**: 48500 USD (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
**Target Bonus**: 3.28L
**Total comp [First year]**: ~42.4L (Salary + Bonus + Stock)
**Benefits**: Standard google benefits

All Amounts in INR
**Current CTC**: 16.5L (All fixed)
Is this a good offer? I tried negotiating for increase in base, but they couldn't compromise it and gave extra equity.

Can anyone help me with Relocation process? I'm not sure about the terms and HR mentioned some other team will contact me after accepting the offer, but I'm eager to know earlier.
